title: MySQLCOS()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLCOS()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return the cosine of a number:
SELECT COS(2);

Definition and Usage
The COS() function returns the cosine of a number.
Syntax
COS(
number
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
number
Required. A numeric value
Technical Details
Works in:
From MySQL 4.0
More Examples
Example
Return the cosine of a number:
SELECT COS(PI());

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers MySQLCOS()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use MySQLCOS()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of MySQLCOS()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
